title: What are some ideas for a 7 month anniversary? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some relationships are so intense that 7 months feels like 7 years. If you are going to do something small, go really small. Think "free" love. If you are going to go big, commission art! Find a local artist and support them. Hire some songwriter to write a song.

For a 7 month anniversary, you can gift your spouse with a bouquet of chocolates or flowers with a special note or you can make a customized for him/her.  These kinds of cakes can make your 7 month anniversary special and memorable. Visit the given link below for more such ideas. www.cakefite.com
